snippet.title: BLADESONG | Gameplay preview | #PitchYaGame
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON STEAM ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/2305640/Bladesong/
JOIN OUR DISCORD ► https://discord.gg/bladesong

Have you ever dreamt of designing your very own swords? BLADESONG is a swordmaking game with truly unlimited creative possibilities. Join our Discord to stay posted! ⚔️

#PitchYaGame #indiegames #indiedev #sword
